entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 installed, Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\dotnet\templates\8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41.nupkg(/content/BlazorWeb-CSharp/.template.config/localize/templatestrings.cs.json)".. displays during creating project. #35768

Closed

  • There doesn't seem to be a way to execute tasks or targets for 'dotnet run' #18436
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • ComputeDotnetBaseImageTag: handle rtm and servicing channels. #35775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Skip getting Windows GUI bit on non-Windows in AppHostShellShimMaker #35776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0090 "'new' expression can be simplified" cleanup #35681
    untriaged
  • IDE0002 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35675
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Avoid running new APIs under older TFMs #35765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2279393 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35767
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" cleanup #35678
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --no-http-cache option #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Validate that user applications will run on the selected base image #35246
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update 8.0.2xx for loc #35761
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
